00044         public static string FormatToString(object Input, string Format)
00045         {
00046             try
00047             {
00048                 if (Input == null)
00049                     return "";
00050                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Format))
00051                 {
00052                     return (string)StringHelper.CallMethod("ToString", Input, Format);
00053                 }
00054                 return Input.ToString();
00055             }
00056             catch { throw; }
00057         }
00058 
00065         public static string Left(string Input, int Length)
00066         {
00067             try
00068             {
00069                 return Input.Substring(0, Length);
00070             }
00071             catch { throw; }
00072         }
00073 
00080         public static string Right(string Input, int Length)
00081         {
00082             try
00083             {
00084                 return Input.Substring(Input.Length - Length, Length);
00085             }
00086             catch { throw; }
00087         }

00094         public static string ToFirstCharacterUpperCase(string Input)
00095         {
00096             try
00097             {
00098                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00099                     return null;
00100                 char[] InputChars = Input.ToCharArray();
00101                 for (int x = 0; x < InputChars.Length; ++x)
00102                 {
00103                     if (InputChars[x] != ' ' && InputChars[x] != '\t')
00104                     {
00105                         InputChars[x] = char.ToUpper(InputChars[x]);
00106                         break;
00107                     }
00108                 }
00109                 return new string(InputChars);
00110             }
00111             catch { throw; }
00112         }
00113 
00119         public static string ToSentenceCapitalize(string Input)
00120         {
00121             try
00122             {
00123                 string[] Seperator = { ".", "?", "!" };
00124                 string[] InputStrings = Input.Split(Seperator, StringSplitOptions.None);
00125                 for (int x = 0; x < InputStrings.Length; ++x)
00126                 {
00127                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(InputStrings[x]))
00128                     {
00129                         Regex TempRegex = new Regex(InputStrings[x]);
00130                         InputStrings[x] = ToFirstCharacterUpperCase(InputStrings[x]);
00131                         Input = TempRegex.Replace(Input, InputStrings[x]);
00132                     }
00133                 }
00134                 return Input;
00135             }
00136             catch { throw; }
00137         }
00138 
00144         public static string ToTitleCase(string Input)
00145         {
00146             try
00147             {
00148                 string[] Seperator = { " ", ".", "\t", System.Environment.NewLine, "!", "?" };
00149                 string[] InputStrings = Input.Split(Seperator, StringSplitOptions.None);
00150                 for (int x = 0; x < InputStrings.Length; ++x)
00151                 {
00152                     if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(InputStrings[x]))
00153                     {
00154                         Regex TempRegex = new Regex(InputStrings[x]);
00155                         InputStrings[x] = ToFirstCharacterUpperCase(InputStrings[x]);
00156                         Input = TempRegex.Replace(Input, InputStrings[x]);
00157                     }
00158                 }
00159                 return Input;
00160             }
00161             catch { throw; }
00162         }

00169         public static bool IsValidEmail(string Input)
00170         {
00171             try
00172             {
00173                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00174                     return false;
00175                 Regex TempReg = new Regex(@"^([a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.]+)@((\[[0-9]{1,3}" +
00176                       @"\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\" +
00177                       @".)+))([a-zA-Z]{2,4}|[0-9]{1,3})(\]?)$");
00178                 return TempReg.IsMatch(Input);
00179             }
00180             catch { throw; }
00181         }
00182 
00188         public static bool IsValidDomain(string Input)
00189         {
00190             try
00191             {
00192                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00193                     return false;
00194                 Regex TempReg = new Regex(@"^(http|https|ftp)://([a-zA-Z0-9_-]*(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*)+):?([0-9]+)?/?");
00195                 return TempReg.IsMatch(Input);
00196             }
00197             catch { throw; }
00198         }

00206         public static int NumberTimesOccurs(string Input, string Match)
00207         {
00208             try
00209             {
00210                 Regex TempRegex = new Regex(Match);
00211                 return TempRegex.Matches(Input).Count;
00212             }
00213             catch { throw; }
00214         }

00221         public static string ReverseString(string Input)
00222         {
00223             try
00224             {
00225                 char[] ArrayValues = Input.ToCharArray();
00226                 Array.Reverse(ArrayValues);
00227                 return new string(ArrayValues);
00228             }
00229             catch { throw; }
00230         }

00238         public static string FilterOutText(string Input, string Filter)
00239         {
00240             try
00241             {
00242                 Regex TempRegex = new Regex(Filter);
00243                 return TempRegex.Replace(Input, "");
00244             }
00245             catch { throw; }
00246         }

00254         public static string KeepFilterText(string Input, string Filter)
00255         {
00256             try
00257             {
00258                 Regex TempRegex = new Regex(Filter);
00259                 MatchCollection Collection = TempRegex.Matches(Input);
00260                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00261                 foreach (Match Match in Collection)
00262                 {
00263                     Builder.Append(Match.Value);
00264                 }
00265                 return Builder.ToString();
00266             }
00267             catch { throw; }
00268         }
00269 
00275         public static string AlphaNumericOnly(string Input)
00276         {
00277             try
00278             {
00279                 return KeepFilterText(Input, "[a-zA-Z0-9]");
00280             }
00281             catch { throw; }
00282         }
00283 
00289         public static string AlphaCharactersOnly(string Input)
00290         {
00291             try
00292             {
00293                 return KeepFilterText(Input, "[a-zA-Z]");
00294             }
00295             catch { throw; }
00296         }

00304         public static string NumericOnly(string Input,bool KeepNumericPunctuation)
00305         {
00306             try
00307             {
00308                 if (KeepNumericPunctuation)
00309                 {
00310                     return KeepFilterText(Input, @"[0-9\.]");
00311                 }
00312                 return KeepFilterText(Input, "[0-9]");
00313             }
00314             catch { throw; }
00315         }

00324         public static Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.List<string>> GetAnagramEquivalents(System.Collections.Generic.List<string> InputArray)
00325         {
00326             try
00327             {
00328                 Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.List<string>> ReturnList = new Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.List<string>>();
00329                 for (int x = 0; x < InputArray.Count; ++x)
00330                 {
00331                     char[] InputCharArray = InputArray[x].ToCharArray();
00332                     Array.Sort(InputCharArray);
00333                     string InputString = new string(InputCharArray);
00334                     if (ReturnList.ContainsKey(InputString))
00335                     {
00336                         ReturnList[InputString].Add(InputArray[x]);
00337                     }
00338                     else
00339                     {
00340                         ReturnList.Add(InputString, new System.Collections.Generic.List<string>());
00341                         ReturnList[InputString].Add(InputArray[x]);
00342                     }
00343                 }
00344                 return ReturnList;
00345             }
00346             catch { throw; }
00347         }

00351         #region Private Static Functions
00352 
00360         private static object CallMethod(string MethodName, object Object, params object[] InputVariables)
00361         {
00362             try
00363             {
00364                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(MethodName) || Object == null)
00365                     return null;
00366                 Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00367                 MethodInfo Method = null;
00368                 if (InputVariables != null)
00369                 {
00370                     Type[] MethodInputTypes = new Type[InputVariables.Length];
00371                     for (int x = 0; x < InputVariables.Length; ++x)
00372                     {
00373                         MethodInputTypes[x] = InputVariables[x].GetType();
00374                     }
00375                     Method = ObjectType.GetMethod(MethodName, MethodInputTypes);
00376                     if (Method != null)
00377                     {
00378                         return Method.Invoke(Object, InputVariables);
00379                     }
00380                 }
00381                 Method = ObjectType.GetMethod(MethodName);
00382                 if (Method != null)
00383                 {
00384                     return Method.Invoke(Object, null);
00385                 }
00386                 return null;
00387             }
00388             catch { throw; }
00389         }
00390 
00391         #endregion
00392     }
